title: The most snowballing champion in the game

replies.body:
_Looks at the title._
_Looks at the author._

Nunu.

_Opens the thread._

Yuuuuup.
http://cdn4.gurl.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/tumblr_m9smq0RHbg1qefo74o1_500.gif

That feel when you see the bait coming

and you still take it
> **Did you mean : **_D r a v e n ?_

Not *D r a v en *, 
#D r a a a a a a a a a  v e n
https://giant.gfycat.com/UnfoldedApprehensiveCavy.gif
you forgot an 'a'
**D r a a a a a a a a a v e a n?**

More like... **D r a a a a a a a a a v e n a**!

http://pre15.deviantart.net/0dd4/th/pre/i/2013/140/5/2/draven_by_exaxuxer-d65xvt3.png

I feel as if a female Draven would be a pornstar.
that moment when you realize... There is actualy a female pornstar named Draven...

A male Draven would too.
And Darius would kek'd in shame.
http://www.gifbin.com/bin/reverse-sw832yu7293.gif?noredirect
Please no I can't handle more Draven, I'm gunna lose my mind @-@.
Ｄ Ｒ Ａ Ａ Ａ Ａ Ａ Ａ Ａ Ａ Ａ Ａ Ａ Ａ Ｖ Ｅ Ｎ

I would never do something like that on purpose just to bait clicks.
